Eclipse 3.0.1 works well on Windows XP, for the hundreds of thousands of people

Please submit bug reports related to the Eclipse product in the Platform
product, after researching that there is in fact a bug by posting a message to
the eclipse.newcomer or eclipse.platform newsgroups.

Thanks.
